amendment.description: To provide exceptions to the bilateral agreement requirement for transfers of defense items to the United Kingdom and Australia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3429 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3429 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To provide exceptions to the bilateral agreement requirement for transfers of defense items to the United Kingdom and Australia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3429 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3429 proposed by Senator Warner.
